TEXT.TITLE: JAPANESE CRUSHERS BUY CANADIAN RAPESEEED
TEXT.BODY: Japanese crushers bought 3,000 to 4,000 tonnes of Canadian rapeseed in export business overnight for last half May/first half June shipment, trade sources said. Reuter
